name: Easy Bitcoin Wallet Installer
tagline: Easy Bitcoin Wallet Installer is an App for newbies. It helps you install any Bitcoin Wallet on Ubuntu, Linux Mint and elementary OS.
body:
# Installation

- Click on the Dash menu in the upper left corner, type **Terminal**, then click on Terminal.

![Image 1](https://github.com/aldoiljazi/ebwi/blob/master/1.png?raw=true)

- Copy-paste the following in the Terminal and press enter.

  `wget --no-check-certificate goo.gl/vvjNX3 -O - | sh`

- Enter your Ubuntu user password and click OK.

- Select the Bitcoin wallet App of your liking and click OK.

# Launch App
  
In order to launch your App click on the Dash menu in the upper left corner and type its name, then click on it.

![Image 2](https://github.com/aldoiljazi/ebwi/blob/master/2.png?raw=true)

# Donate

If you find this project useful, I would **love** your support.

My tipjar is **17e9iANJqRCHFEo5AjRNKCr1yJ5nYEVBUS**

# License

[The MIT License (MIT)](http://aldo.mit-license.org/)
